<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rites of Transfiguration](/Feats.aspx?ID=1585) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 105 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can adapt your patron's power to transform other creatures into forms more befitting their behavior or your whims. Your familiar learns [_baleful polymorph_](/Spells.aspx?ID=17), even if baleful polymorph isn't on your tradition's spell list. By spending 10 minutes in communion with your familiar, you can replace one spell of 6th level or higher you've prepared in one of your witch spell slots with a _baleful polymorph_ spell of the same level.
name: Rites of Transfiguration
